description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: High Speed Rail (Hong Kong Section) runs additional train trips
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 高速鐵路(香港段)加開臨時列車服務

2025-10-16T20:21:00.CONTENT_EN: As informed by the Chinese Mainland Railway Authorities, High Speed Rail (Hong Kong Section) will add the following temporary train trips: From Guangzhounan Station to Hong Kong West Kowloon Station • 24 Oct: G9533 From Hong Kong West Kowloon Station to Shenzhenbei Station • 26 Oct: G9534 Tickets are available for purchase through the 12306 official website (12306. cn) or mobile app; appointed travel agents; or at Hong Kong West Kowloon Station. For train schedules, please refer to the 12306 official website (12306. cn) or mobile app.
2025-10-16T20:21:00.CONTENT_CN: 中國內地鐵路部門通知，高速鐵路（香港段）將加開以下臨時列車車次： 由廣州南站前往香港西九龍站 •10月24日：G9533 由香港西九龍站前往深圳北站 •10月26日：G9534 乘客可透過12306官方網站(12306.cn)或手機應用程式、指定代理或前往香港西九龍站購買列車車票。  有關列車服務詳情，請瀏覽12306官方網站(12306.cn)或手機應用程式。

2025-10-17T14:30:00.CONTENT_EN:
Due to mechanical failure of the vessel, the following ferry service is suspended from 02:15 pm. 
Coral Sea Ferry Service Company Limited
- between Sam Ka Tsuen and Sai Wan Ho .
2025-10-17T14:30:00.CONTENT_CN:
因船隻機械故障，以下渡輪服務於下午02時15分起暫停服務。
珊瑚海船務有限公司
-往來三家村及西灣河:

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Suspension of advance ticket sales for selected train trips
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 個別列車車次暫停預售

2025-10-18T18:02:00.CONTENT_EN: As informed by the Chinese Mainland Railway Authorities, advance ticket sales for the following train trips will be suspended: From Hong Kong West Kowloon Station to Guangzhounan Station • From 1 Nov and onwards: G6582, G6536, G6508, G6538, G6588, G6505, G6527, G6583, G6537, G6585, G6509 From Zhaoqingdong Station to Hong Kong West Kowloon Station • From 1 Nov and onwards: G6579 For the latest advance ticket sales arrangements, please refer to the 12306 official website (12306. cn) and mobile app, High Speed Rail website and mobile app.
2025-10-18T18:02:00.CONTENT_CN: 中國內地鐵路單位通知，以下列車車次會暫停預售： 來往香港西九龍站及廣州南站 •11月1日及以後：G6582,G6536,G6508,G6538,G6588,G6505,G6527,G6583,G6537,G6585,G6509 由肇慶東站前往香港西九龍站 •11月1日及以後：G6579 有關最新預售安排，請留意12306官方網站(12306.cn)及手機應用程式、高速鐵路網頁及手機應用程式。
